name: decibel-first-quick-win
description: Complete walkthrough of placing your first order on Decibel - includes all critical steps

scripts.quick-win: npm run fund-wallet && npm run setup && npm run create-subaccount && npm run mint-usdc && npm run deposit-usdc && npm run place-order
scripts.all: npm run fund-wallet && npm run setup && npm run create-subaccount && npm run mint-usdc && npm run deposit-usdc
